OMG...Why do=A0all of you=A0spend so much time and energy on all this child=
ish =A0negativity? 
Move on...theres bigger fish out there.
=A0
=A0


IS TH=
IS WHERE YOU LIVE? 
"No, I live in heaven, and my affections
are there. I j=
ust borrow this shack while
waiting for my ride home."

--- On Tue, 8/18/09=
, David Koenig <floridajakeblues@...> wrote:


From: David Koenig <fl=
oridajakeblues@...>
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: NOTICE TO ALL : Enough=
 already!
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Tuesday, August 18, 2009, 7:16 =
PM


=A0 



Hey Everyone. I love this group and I have for a LONG time! I'=
ve NEVER caused a problem here.
I'm not mad at anyone. I just =A0saw what t=
his group of characters did to another forum, so I felt the need to warn yo=
u.
You can ask Steve Brooks at the Magic Cafe about the names they called h=
im before he banned them. It started just like this.
I LOVE EVP's and I've =
been interested in them for YEARS !!!!!!
I've never said anything bad about=
 Frank or anyone who is doing research.
Please ask yourself Misty ... Where=
 did all these new characters come from and why are they already name calli=
ng etc.?
They are here for the sole purpose to disrupt this group. I'm sad =
to see it.


On Tue, Aug 18, 2009 at 5:59 PM, David Koenig <floridajakeblue=
s@ gmail.com> wrote:

The same group attacked the Magic Cafe.
They were all=
 booted out!





On Tue, Aug 18, 2009 at 2:43 PM, Lisa <lawlis1969@yahoo. =
com> wrote:


=A0 




--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com, "Misty" <bulletbabe=
a@ ...> wrote:
>
> I am getting pretty tired of a few whos sole purpose in =
this group is to provoke Frank and other members into negativity. If it con=
tinues you and your fake nicknames will be removed. Your attempts to promot=
e your "other group" will be viewed as spam and deleted as such. They may g=
o unnoticed by the group but they dont go unnoticed by me. Funny how its al=
ways just that one person/group that you promote while every post you make =
is not about your research or anyone elses but rather a play on words meant=
 to provoke someone. You should run a quick background check on your friend=
 the owner of that "other group" you may find you know less than you though=
t you did. You know who you are. And so do I.
> 
> As for Frank, he knows I=
 dont always agree with what he says. He knows I definitely dont agree with=
 the namecalling or public venting. Having said that. Frank is the founder =
of this group. As such he will ALWAYS have a voice here. Those who dont lik=
e that or dont agree are free to move on.
> 
> If you are here to learn abo=
ut EVP-ITC, Frank's Box, or share your research, by all means do so. If you=
 are here for another purpose then dont be surprised when you go to sign in=
 and find you are no longer a member here.
> 
> Misty
>

Hi Misty,

I joine=
d this group a long time ago...pretty much a silent observer. I don't even =
read all of the emails I get on updates. I thought when I saw the whole nam=
e calling thing it was some sensitive person whining about a spirit saying =
colorful things to them...then I read a few. ARE THEY SERIOUS. Please know =
there are many people who agree with you and Frank and agree whole heartedl=
y you should delete the faint of heart...LOL. Can you imagine how they woul=
d react to a simple BOO from a voice from beyond? LOL...what fools.







=
